response.original_title: Hard and Heavy Then & Now Vol XIV
response.overview: Video anthology. Songs: 220 Volt - Love Is All You Need, Andy Timmons Band - Deliver Us (Live), Angel Vivaldi - A Mercurian Summer,  The Sign - Anthem, Man In The Middle - 2, Badmouth - To Watch The Bridges Burn,  Bullet - Highway Pirates, Cherie & Marie Curie - Since You've Been Gone, Clout - Under Fire,  Dark Moor - On The Hill Of Dreams, Dirty Penny - Midnight Ride, Frank Stallone - Far From Over,  Galneryus - Everlasting, Galneryus - New Legend, Feel The Fire Of Love, GTR - When The Heart Rules The Mind, Hellyeah - Better Man, Iron Fire - Leviathan, Joey Tempest - A Place To Call Home, L.A. Guns - Sex Action, Leverage - Mister Universe, Little River Band - The Night Owls, Mad Max - Hope To See You, Mama's Boys - One Last Chance (live), Mob Rules - Last Farewell, Nelson - After The Rain, Pretty Maids - Please Don't Leave Me, Reckless Love - Back To Paradise, Robert Tepper - No Easy Way Out, The Unguided - Phoenix Down, Unisonic - Unisonic, Van Halen - Tattoo
response.title: Hard and Heavy Then & Now Vol XIV
